_header: Lord sweet Jesu Christ have mercy of me
Subjects: prayers, to Christ; Christ, prayers to
_description: ‘An orison to vr lord Ihu’ — ten long monorhyming quatrains

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
LOrd Swete Ihesu cristHaue Merci of meÞat out of heuene
                    comeIn to eorþe for me…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…On domes dai whon þou schalt demenScheuh us þi face
                    freoAnd bring vs in to paradysÞer endeles blisse schal beo.
                    Amen.
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title: An orsoun to vr lord Ihesu (f. 115rc)
